bibl.title: Notes on Some Greek Amulets.
bibl.note: 1. A bronze ring in the Cabinet des Médailles [Seyrig Collection, No. 9]. - 2. A divided plea on three gemstones. - 3. A seated Aphrodite Arrôriphrasis. - 4. Three new magical gems in the Hecht Museum of the University of Haifa.
bibl.seg: FARAONE Christopher A., Notes on Some Greek Amulets.

1. A bronze ring in the Cabinet des Médailles [Seyrig Collection, No. 9]. - 2. A divided plea on three gemstones. - 3. A seated Aphrodite Arrôriphrasis. - 4. Three new magical gems in the Hecht Museum of the University of Haifa.
